Subseries H: Personal correspondence

Scope and Contents note

Some letters are undated or unclearly dated. Dates given here may not be accurate or inclusive because in folders with more than one letter only legible dates are given.

Series II: Universal Movement Theatre Repertory

Scope and Contents note

Material in this series includes correspondence, financial records, flyers, playbills, brochures, CVs, and general business documents. Some folders contain materials spanning several years, some of which is undated.

Series III: The Living Theatre

Scope and Contents note

Dates are given wherever possible but since some folders contain undated or variously dated materials, the dates listed here are not entirely accurate or do not cover the entire period indicated.

Series V: Videorecordings

Subseries A: Video Recordings - Access Copies

Conditions Governing Access

Access copies for some materials are available by appointment for reading room viewing and listening only. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

Series VI: Audio

Subseries A: Audio Recordings - Access Copies

Conditions Governing Access

Audio recordings have not been preserved and may not be available to researchers.

Organized alphabetically by subject. Access copies may not be available yet. Please check with the Fales Archivist.

31142063612652box: 77, folder: 67 (Material Type: Mixed Materials)

Series VIII: Posters

Scope and Contents note

In addition to posters there are some oversize photographs (The Living Theatre) as well as sketches and technical drawings in this series. There is also a large scrapbook in folder 1 of box 78. Materials are arranged alphabetically according to theatre group or director. A performance title is given only when no theatre group or director is indicated. The two boxes (one small, one large) are alphabetized independently.

Albee Directs Albee Production Calendars , 1978-1979
